short_summary: Request for supply arrangement - Goods (Motor Vehicles)
description: Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for two tractors.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Motor Vehicles Tender E60HS-18AGTR

### Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking proposals for the supply of two agricultural tractors to be delivered by March 31, 2025.

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 30006149
* **Reference Number**: CB-34-97584764
* **Publication Date**: November 8, 2024
* **Close Date**: November 25, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GDS)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6
* **Contact**: Paul Fortier, Telephone: 343-596-9926, Email: Paul.Fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

### Tender Requirements

* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A to be eligible to submit a proposal for this tender.
* The delivery date for the tractors is March 31, 2025.

### Attachments

The tender notice and related documents are available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website:

* [Attachment 1: Tender Notice in English (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51308/30006149-sa-e60hs-18agtr-en-npp.pdf)
* [Attachment 2: Tender Notice in French (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51308/30006149-sa-e60hs-18agtr-fr-npp.pdf)

### Important Dates

* November 8, 2024: Tender notice published
* November 25, 2024: Close date for submission of proposals
* March 31, 2025: Delivery date for tractors

I made several key changes to your text:
-   Removed all irrelevant information to save space and make the text cleaner.
-   Set clear headings to break up the text into logical sections.
-   Rephrased sentences for a more professional tone.
